params.ariaRetry: Retry the task. You can improve your previous answer if the author allowed that.
params.taskDescription: What is the probability that you draw (in order) the letters W-I-N?
params.detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>1</mn>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mn>1</mn>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mn>2</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <msub>
        <mi></mi>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mn>10</mn>
        </mrow>
      </msub>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msub>
          <mi>P</mi>
          <mn>3</mn>
        </msub>
      </mrow>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
  <mo>≈<!-- ≈ --></mo>
  <mn>0.278</mn>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">%<!-- % --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{{1\, \times \,1 \,\times\, 2}}{{_{10}{P_3}}} \approx 0.278\%</annotation></semantics></math>

params.taskDescription: What is the probability that you draw (in order) the letters W-I-S-E?

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>

      <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mn>2</mn>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>

    </mrow>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <msub>
        <mi></mi>

          <mn>10</mn>

params.taskDescription: What is the probability that you draw (in order) the letters S-E-E-N?
params.detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>2</mn>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mn>2</mn>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mn>1</mn>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mn>2</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <msub>
        <mi></mi>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mn>10</mn>
        </mrow>
      </msub>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msub>
          <mi>P</mi>
          <mn>4</mn>
        </msub>
      </mrow>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
  <mo>≈<!-- ≈ --></mo>
  <mn>0.16</mn>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">%<!-- % --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{{2\, \times\, 2 \,\times \,1\, \times\, 2}}{{_{10}{P_4}}} \approx 0.16\%</annotation></semantics></math>

params.taskDescription: What is the probability that you draw (in any order) the letters W-I-N?
params.detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>1</mn>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mn>1</mn>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
      <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
      <mn>2</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <msub>
        <mi></mi>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mn>10</mn>
        </mrow>
      </msub>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msub>
          <mi>C</mi>
          <mn>3</mn>
        </msub>
      </mrow>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
  <mo>≈<!-- ≈ --></mo>
  <mn>1.67</mn>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">%<!-- % --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{{1\, \times\, 1\, \times\, 2}}{{_{10}{C_3}}} \approx 1.67\%</annotation></semantics></math>

questionSetStimulus: For the following exercises, you are drawing Scrabble tiles without replacement from a bag containing the letters A, C, E, E, I, N, N, S, S, W.
